title: The application crashes on the trim feature
body:
#### Project Information
* ###### Repository : https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android
* ###### Title App : Lottie
* ###### Publisher App : Airbnb, Inc

***

#### Expected behavior
Supposedly, When I enter a larger number in the "Frame Min" feature rather than the "Max Frame" feature found on the "Showcase" menu, the Application does not stop.

#### Actual behavior
When I enter a larger number in the "Frame Min" feature than the "Max Frame" feature found on the "Showcase" menu, the Application stops.

#### How to reproduce
1. Instal App [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.airbnb.lottie)
2. Sign in one of the "Showcase" views
3. Sign in on "Trim" feature.
4. Then input a larger number on the "Min Frame menu" of the number already in the "Max Frame menu", after you want to confirm it will crash the application.

#### Environment
* ###### Device : Redmi Note 5A
* ###### System Operating : 7.1.0 Nougat
* ###### App Version : 2.5.5

***
***

#### <center>Recording Of The Issues</center>
https://youtu.be/3XB3-xFJmuc

***

#### Logcat
